name: Step Bak Copywriting
description:
Step Bak offers freelance copywriting, editing and proofreading services alongside search engine optimisation (SEO), which can demonstrate the professionalism, attention to detail and clarity your customers and potential customers will be expecting. One of the first encounters a potential customer, client or user is likely to have with you will be through your website and other copy, such as reports, press releases and case studies.
These must be well written, carefully edited and thoroughly checked, otherwise it is likely to harm a reader’s impression and diminish your reputation.
